properties.name: Center One Mall
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 I am not much into Shopping but if you are then this is the place for it.

properties.name: City Center Mall & Cinemax Multiplex
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 The City Center Mall is the Next Door Neighbour and Rival of the Palm Beach Galleria Mall. All I can say to that is... "LOVE THY NEIGHBOUR"

properties.name: MEGHRAJ Multiplex
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 This used to be a called Meghraj and was a Single Screen Theater and a Den for Taporis and Hooligans who loved Bollywood Movies but even though it has changed its name to Meghraj Multiplex ... I think it still looks like a Single Screen Theater. There are many Posh Multiplexes around but this Lousy Multiplex (Single Screen) is My Favourite, because its Fun watching a Movie with all those Whistles and Snide Remarks from all those Taporis or Hooligans. Just Visit their Tacky Website and You will know What I Mean... :-) www.meghrajmultiplex.com

properties.name: Mangroves Are Disappearing
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 There Used to Mangroves In Here, but not anymore... Zoom In to See for Yourself how the Builders are Slowly but Steadily cutting of all the Protected Magroves to make way for More Buildings, Malls and Multiplexes (Yawn...)

properties.name: Palm Beach Galleria (Mall & Adlabs Multiplex)
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 This is one of the Posh Malls and Multiplexes in Town. I Feel Suffocated when I am Surrounded by Excessive Luxury, so I usually stay away from this place except when I have to Buy Gadgets at a Discount OR I\'m in a Mood to Splurge on a Good Movie

properties.name: Raghuleela Mall
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 This is the Newest Mall in Town next to the Railway Station but I haven\'t gone there as yet and I don\'t plan to go there any time soon. "ALL IN ALL ITS JUST ANOTHER BRICK IN THE WALL OR...in this case... MALL"

properties.name: Soltitude Point and Lovers Point
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 This is where Most People come to find Soltitude and Peace and this place also Doubles Up as a Breeding Ground for Lovers to meet each other ... but mostly Behind the Bushes ... So that their Family Members don\'t catch their Secret Love Affair. India is still a Largely Conservative Soceity.

properties.name: Trombay
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 Mumbai

properties.name: Vashi Bridge
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 The Bridge at the Top is the Old Vashi Bridge which was built in 1973 but its now obsolete though its still standing. The Middle Bridge is the New Vashi Bridge and the Bridge at the Bottom is the Vashi Railway Bridge

properties.name: Vashi Mangroves
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 Some of the Few Places Reserved for Nature

properties.name: Vashi Railway Station and Software Park
properties.description: Posted by Cpax12 Unlike Most Railway Stations in Mumbai, This One is Surprisingly Well Designed
